summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Due Date (Fecha Límite) feature for Tableros module. All core functionality is working correctly: calendar picker, month navigation, date/time selection, activity logging, badge colors, and data persistence.
critical_code_review_comments: TaskModal.jsx: Well-implemented calendar picker with custom month navigation, day selection, and time input
BoardView.jsx: Proper badge color logic based on due date urgency (gray=normal, amber/yellow=upcoming <=3 days, red=overdue)
Backend UpdateCardRequest model correctly includes due_date, due_time, due_date_activities fields
Activity logging properly records 'estableció fecha límite', 'cambió el plazo', 'eliminó fecha límite' events
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes for testing
seed_data_creation: Created and cleaned up TEST_DueDate_ prefixed boards during backend testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Due date feature is fully functional. Test file at /app/tests/test_due_date_feature.py can be reused for regression testing.

calendar_opens_on_click.description: Clicking 'Fecha límite' button in modal sidebar opens calendar picker

day_selection.description: Clicking a day selects it and saves the date

time_selector.description: 'Vence a las' time input works correctly

clear_due_date.description: 'Borrar Fecha Límite' button removes the date

date_format_display.description: Date shows in correct format (e.g., '6 ene 2026 12:00')

badge_on_card.description: Due date badge appears on card in board view

badge_color_normal.description: Gray badge for dates more than 3 days away

badge_color_upcoming.description: Amber/yellow badge for dates within 3 days

activity_set_date.description: 'Usuario estableció una fecha límite' logged in Activity section

activity_change_date.description: 'Usuario cambió el plazo' logged in Activity section

activity_delete_date.description: 'Usuario eliminó la fecha límite' logged in Activity section

persistence_after_reload.description: Due date persists after page reload

persistence_with_other_fields.description: Due date works correctly with checklist, priority, and labels
